Infotext

Use the infotext to clearly visualize important numbers.

Installation 

                  
                    npm i @govflanders/vl-ui-infotext

or 

                  
                    yarn add @govflanders/vl-ui-infotext

Usage

Import SASS 

                  
                  @import "vl-ui-infotext/src/scss/infotext";

Make sure your sass --include-path includes node_modules/@govflanders/.

Import JS

                  
                  import { Infotext } from '@govflanders/vl-ui-infotext';

Infotext

The infotext consists of a large label at the top and a small label at the bottom. The large label contains a number. The small label contains a description that puts the number in context. Apply the data-vl-infotext-value attribute to fit the text in the component.

3200
Bezoekers per dag
      <div class="vl-infotext-wrapper">
    <div class="vl-infotext">
      <div class="vl-infotext__value" data-vl-infotext-value>3200</div>
      <div class="vl-infotext__text">Bezoekers per dag</div>
    </div>
  </div>

Infotext with link

By adding a link to the infotext both labels get a different color and become clickable.

3200
Bezoekers per dag
 
      <div class="vl-infotext-wrapper">
    <a class="vl-infotext" href="#">
      <div class="vl-infotext__value">3200</div>
      <div class="vl-infotext__text">Bezoekers per dag</div>
    </a>
  </div>

Infotext badge

A round badge is wrapped around both labels. Apply the data-vl-infotext-value attribute to fit the text in the component.

12
Openstaande taken
      <div class="vl-infotext-wrapper">
    <div class="vl-infotext vl-infotext--badge">
      <div class="vl-infotext__value" data-vl-infotext-value>12</div>
      <div class="vl-infotext__text">Openstaande taken</div>
    </div>
  </div>

Infotext badge with link

By adding a link to the infotext both labels get a different color and become clickable.

12
Openstaande taken
 
      <div class="vl-infotext-wrapper">
    <a class="vl-infotext vl-infotext--badge" href="#">
      <div class="vl-infotext__value">12</div>
      <div class="vl-infotext__text">Openstaande taken</div>
    </a>
  </div>
